components.component:
org.jboss.seam.ui.SelectItems org.jboss.seam.ui.SelectItems org.jboss.seam.ui.component.html.HtmlSelectItems org.jboss.seam.ui.component.UISelectItems
Creates a List<SelectItem> from a List, Set, DataModel or Array.
selectItems org.jboss.seam.ui.taglib.SelectItemsTag
org.ajax4jsf.framework.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
&ui_select_items_attributes;
value java.lang.Object an EL expression specifying the data that backs the List<SelectItem>
var java.lang.String defines the name of the local variable that holds the current object during iteration
label java.lang.String the label to be used when rendering the SelectItem. Can reference the var variable
disabled java.lang.Boolean if true the SelectItem will be rendered disabled. Can reference the var variable
noSelectionLabel java.lang.String specifies the (optional) label to place at the top of list (if required="true" is also specified then selecting this value will cause a validation error)
hideNoSelectionLabel java.lang.Boolean if true, the noSelectionLabel will be hidden when a value is selected
